bio.summary: Stephy Tang (traditional Chinese: 鄧麗欣 or simplified: 邓丽欣) is a cantopop singer (Chinese pop music performed in Cantonese) and actress. Tang was born on October 15, 1983 in Hong Kong. She graduated from Buddhist Sum Heung Lam Memorial College and the Department of Fashion Design at IVE. In 2002, she joined girl group Cookies, and was the leader until the group disbanded in late 2004. As a solo artist, Tang has released 3 albums so far: Read more on Last.fm
bio.content: Stephy Tang (traditional Chinese: 鄧麗欣 or simplified: 邓丽欣) is a cantopop singer (Chinese pop music performed in Cantonese) and actress. Tang was born on October 15, 1983 in Hong Kong. She graduated from Buddhist Sum Heung Lam Memorial College and the Department of Fashion Design at IVE. In 2002, she joined girl group Cookies, and was the leader until the group disbanded in late 2004. As a solo artist, Tang has released 3 albums so far: 鄧麗欣 - Coloring Stephy (August 2005) 鄧麗欣 - Fantasy (March 2006) and 鄧麗欣 - 全新廣東大碟《 Dating Stephy 》 (February 2007). Read more on Last.fm.
